channel.title: Diary on I am Maylyn, I live with my parent in sunny California
channel.description: Recent content in Diary on I am Maylyn, I live with my parent in sunny California

item.title: Cọp vằn Mochi
item.description:
I’m Maylyn. I cannot read and write right now so my dad writing for me :). Actually he guess what I was about to think at this time.

At home, my parent call me Mochi. However, due to my personality my dad keeps calling me Cọp Vằn, Khỉ Con, Chibu or whatever cute name he can comes up.
